items.title: My life partner is 18 years my senior. He wants to leave his $4.5 million fortune to me — not his two kids. Do we tell them?
items.description: “No doubt they would feel the arrangement is unfair, and that would potentially end our relationship.”

items.title: Trump’s playbook may be tossed, but higher tariffs are here to stay — one way or another
items.description: Is Trump’s trade strategy in limbo? Yes, but ‘Tariff Man’ has options.

items.title: My friend is getting divorced. Her husband kindly said, ‘Take the house.’ Is there a catch?
items.description: “After my friend said that perhaps she’ll just settle for the house, her husband agreed and moved to file for divorce quickly.”

items.title: My father-in-law has dementia and is moving in with us. Can we invoice him for a caregiver?
items.description: “Do we have an obligation to provide my wife’s troubled sibling with an accounting of my father-in-law’s expenses?”

items.title: My husband and I earn $115K. We’re inheriting $300K. Should we invest in real estate or stock?
items.description: “We have $40,000 in credit-card debt and two financed vehicles with $100,000 in debt combined.”
